name: SpamLands
description:
Your objective is to kill all the bosses. The game becomes gradually harder with each boss, but as the enemies become tougher so do you. Develop your skills in 3 diffrent combat styles, all with a focus on spamming and mashing your keys. 

Get loot, go to a town, sell your loot. Buy food that will aid in your journey to the final boss. Settle a campfire and spam keys to eat lots of well deserved food. Fight your way through giants, trolls, orcs and goblins. And what will happen when you face the final boss...

Don't worry if you lose, it's kinda hard.
